option_text_en: Wait and observe until the picture becomes clearer.
Share my view calmly without pushing hard.
option_text_ar: أعبّر بهدوء عن رأيي دون إصرار.

option_text_en: Go along to keep harmony and avoid tension.
option_text_ar: أساير حفاظاً على الانسجام وتجنب التوتر.

option_text_en: Oppose clearly even if it creates discomfort.
option_text_ar: أعارض بوضوح حتى لو سبب توتراً.

option_text_en: Reflect first: what pattern is happening here?
option_text_ar: أتأمل أولاً: ما النمط المتكرر هنا؟

option_text_en: Address it directly and set a boundary.
Choose a gentle conversation to protect the bond.
Create a clear agreement and steps to prevent repeats.
option_text_ar: أضع اتفاقاً وخطوات واضحة لمنع التكرار.

option_text_en: Ask for examples and clarity before reacting.
option_text_ar: أطلب أمثلة وتوضيحاً قبل أن أتصرف.

option_text_en: Propose a bold initiative to show impact quickly.
option_text_ar: أقترح مبادرة جريئة لأُظهر الأثر سريعاً.

option_text_en: Check how my feedback affects relationships and tone.
option_text_ar: أنتبه لتأثير الملاحظة على العلاقات والنبرة.

option_text_en: Turn the feedback into measurable tasks and routine.
option_text_ar: أحوّل الملاحظة لمهام قابلة للقياس وروتين.

option_text_en: Pause and read carefully before replying.
Step in and name the issue directly.
Try to calm everyone and reduce tension.
Set rules: one point at a time, respectful tone.
Step back and re-check priorities before rushing.
Make a decisive call and move forward.
Align with people first so everyone stays okay.
option_text_ar: أراعي الناس أولاً حتى يبقى الجو جيداً.

option_text_en: Create a new plan and track changes tightly.
option_text_ar: أضع خطة جديدة وأتابع التغييرات بدقة.

option_text_en: Stay quiet, reflect, and respond later.
Ask to take it privately and set boundaries.
option_text_ar: أطلب نقل الحديث للخاص وأضع حدوداً.

option_text_en: Study the long-term impact before deciding.
option_text_ar: أدرس أثرها بعيد المدى قبل القرار.

option_text_en: Ask how it affects relationships and stability.
option_text_ar: أسأل كيف تؤثر على العلاقات والاستقرار.

option_text_en: List risks, make a checklist, then decide.
option_text_ar: أكتب المخاطر وقائمة تحقق ثم أقرر.

option_text_en: Observe the root cause before intervening.
Push them directly to step up.
Support them emotionally and encourage them.
Define roles, expectations, and deadlines clearly.
Pause and examine what is truly fair here.
option_text_ar: أتوقف وأفحص ما هو العادل فعلاً.

option_text_en: Speak up even if it costs me.
option_text_ar: أتكلم حتى لو كان على حسابي.

option_text_en: Address it gently without shaming anyone.
Document it and follow a proper process.
Listen carefully and seek the bigger picture.
option_text_ar: أستمع للجميع وأبحث عن الصورة الأكبر.

option_text_en: Choose the side I believe is right and say it.
option_text_ar: أختار الطرف الذي أراه على حق وأصرّح.

option_text_en: Try to reconcile and protect both relationships.
Set a clear boundary: I won't be pulled into sides.
option_text_ar: أضع حدّاً: لن أنحاز لأي طرف.

option_text_en: Delay slightly to collect essential info.
Ask others’ feelings and concerns first.
option_text_ar: أسأل عن مخاوف ومشاعر الآخرين أولاً.

option_text_en: Create a simple decision rule and follow it.
option_text_ar: أضع قاعدة قرار بسيطة وألتزم بها.

option_text_en: Re-prioritize: do the highest-value part only.
Be kind to myself and communicate gently.
Use structure: break it into steps and finish.
Attend fully and support everyone warmly.

option_text_ar: أحضر لفترة قصيرة ثم أعود للراحة.

option_text_en: Decline politely to protect personal time.
option_text_ar: أعتذر بلطف للحفاظ على وقتي الخاص.

option_text_en: Save most of it for security.
Respect their space and check later.
Spend more time with loved ones.
option_text_ar: أقضي وقتًا أطول مع من أحب.

option_text_en: Offer help and check their needs.
Set a calm boundary about timing.
Encourage a bold step to fix it now.
option_text_ar: تشجعه على خطوة جريئة للحل الآن.

option_text_en: Make a simple plan for the day.
Take one bold shortcut to finish.
Choose what feels kind and fair.
Join if it feels meaningful to people.
option_text_ar: تنضم إذا كان له أثر على الناس.

option_text_en: Accept and go for the adventure.
Speak up to the group politely.
Ask the person how they feel.
Create a simple rule for inclusion.
Start with the hardest part now.
Ask a friend to check on you.
Do a quick kind favor first.
Lower your voice and soften tone.
Set a clear boundary and pause.
Say what is right even if hard.
option_text_ar: تقول الحق حتى لو كان صعبًا.

option_text_en: Hold your dignity and step away.
Do a small act of kindness.
Think and propose a smarter way.
Ask the team what they need.
Listen and let them share details.
Suggest a simple next step plan.
Ask someone to keep you accountable.
Do a small kind act to reset.
Send a warm message of care.
Ask what support the team needs.
option_text_ar: تسأل عما يحتاجه الفريق من دعم.

option_text_en: Create a simple system to prevent it.
Take one brave step to simplify.
Pick one habit and track it.
Set a strict daily time block.
Ask a friend to join you.
Start with a small helpful act.
Set a clear standard and follow up.
Make a small plan inspired by it.
Calm the tone with kind words.
Set a rule to keep it respectful.
Say a bold line to stop it.
Own it and speak up immediately.
Offer help to reduce the damage.
Help briefly then return to tasks.
Ask them to share details first.
Say yes and handle it fully.
Ask what they want from you.
Start with one kind gift pile.
Do a calming kindness for yourself.
Take a brave step you avoid.
Ask people how it affects them.
Create a checklist to prevent it.
Go only if it fits your structure.
Stand up for the right point.
Do a supportive act for someone.
Help if you can with care.
Put a strict plan for tomorrow.
Set a clear rule for next time.
Help someone with a small need.
Set a clear rule and stick to it.
Take a firm action to stop it.
Ask how they felt and listen.
Set a rule for yourself next time.
Do it with a friend’s support.
Start with helping someone else too.
option_text_ar: تبدأ مع دعم شخص آخر أيضًا.

option_text_en: Respond with a wise calm reply.
Hold to your rules and document.
Do one kind act and continue.
Analyze and propose a better way.
Go boldly and meet new faces.
option_text_ar: تذهب بجرأة للتعرف على أشخاص جدد.

option_text_en: Try it and take the risk.
Set rules to keep it consistent.
Ask the team what they need.
Create a rule to avoid it.
Help with care when you can.
Step in bravely to stop harm.
Ask a friend to check on you.
Do a kind act to restart.

Do a kind visit or check-in.

Set a rule for your tone.

Fix it and learn the lesson.
Set a time limit for help.
